Minimal TypeScript/Node client: sign(), verify(), getEvidence(); publishable to npm.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- TypeScript/Node package with same logical API as Python SDK: sign(), verify(), getEvidence()
- Typed interfaces for SignResponse and VerifyResponse
- Package builds and npm pack works; documented for npm publish
- Unit tests (mocked fetch) for sign/verify/getEvidence

См. `docs/en/PLAN_PHASE5.md` — 5.3, Tasks P5.3.3, P5.3.4.
